channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Making a Static Blog with Hugo
item.description: So recently I have had the desire to create a blog so that I can share work on projects with my friends, family, and potential employers. I wanted something simple. Just the posts and eventually things like images. Wordpress and Gost were both a pain to setup, and required things that could potentially be a secuirty hole. If I’m going to be the only person writing posts, why bother with a whole dynamic applicaton?
